services.name: HDR Interior Video
services.description: 4k video of interior units, building amenities, facade and building features.

services.name: HDR Drone Video
services.description: 4k Drone video of the exterior of the building, the street and the vicinity.

services.name: HDR Aerial Photos
services.description: Includes 10 Aerial HDR photos of the exterior of the building, the street and the vicinity.

services.name: HDR Property Photos
services.description: Includes taking HDR photos and touching them up.

package_only.name: Video Editing
description: Editing and colorization of the video
Custom template and animation for the video

disclaimers: The 3 first months of storage is included in the price of virtual tours.
Virtual Tours comes standard with 1 floor unit for condos and 2 floor units for houses
Floor Plan only is available when you purchase a virtual tour
HDR Property Photos comes standard with 20 photos for condos and 35 for houses.
